name: tm04
effect: Teaches Calm Mind to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Calm Mind to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Rollout Gen I: Whirlwind)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Raises SP. ATK and
SP. DEF by focusing
the mind.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Raises SP. ATK and
SP. DEF by focusing
the mind.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user focuses
its mind to raise
the SP. ATK and
SP. DEF stats.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user quietly focuses its mind and
calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk
and Sp. Def stats.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user switches places with a different Pokémon
instantly, using telekinetic power.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also
leave the target frozen.
